Class Utils

java.lang.Object
Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Utility class providing helper methods for common operations within the POS application, such as fetching the current date and time, and creating standardized header panels for UI consistency. This class is designed to be used statically and does not require instantiation, hence the absence of an explicit constructor.
Author:
Segun Oluwole

    • getCurrentDate

      public static String getCurrentDate()

    • getCurrentTime

      public static String getCurrentTime()

    • createHeaderPanel

      public static JPanel createHeaderPanel(POS pos)
      Creates and returns a standardized header panel used across various pages of the POS application. The header includes a back button, the manager's ID, the current date and time, and a log out button.
      Parameters:
      pos - The POS object, providing context and functionality for the actions performed by the header buttons.
      Returns:
      A JPanel object configured as the header panel.
